message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $9,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you consider $8,500?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I can do $8,800, but that's as low as I can go.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. I'm still a bit high at $8,800, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8,600. This feels like a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8,900. I'm trying to make a profit here, after all!
